fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack someone at night, dealing a Powerful attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you do not attack at night, you get favorable investigative results that night (results that make you seem innocent).
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Rocks.
